title: This sub-module gives a summary of the operation of the Emer…
caption_en: This sub-module gives a summary of the operation of the Emergency Exits. Detailed coverage of the Exits is found in the module on Airplane GeneralDoors Exits.

title: The upper door of the crew entry door is classified as an em…
caption_en: The upper door of the crew entry door is classified as an emergency exit.

title: To open the door in an emergency, rotate the upper door hand…
caption_en: To open the door in an emergency, rotate the upper door handle anti-clockwise.

title: Push the door upward and outward and evacuate.
caption_en: Push the door upward and outward and evacuate.

title: The escape hatch in the rear of the passenger cabin is class…
caption_en: The escape hatch in the rear of the passenger cabin is classified as an emergency exit

title: To open it, remove the handle cover by pulling it off.
caption_en: To open it, remove the handle cover by pulling it off.

title: Hold the handle and pull it inward towards you.
caption_en: Hold the handle and pull it inward towards you.

title: Hold the handle and pull it inward towards you.
caption_en: Hold the handle and pull it inward towards you.

title: Support the lower edge of the hatch as the upper part separa…
caption_en: Support the lower edge of the hatch as the upper part separates from the structure. Lift the hatch off from the opening and pass it out of the exit.

title: When exiting from the escape hatch, note that the wing leadi…
caption_en: When exiting from the escape hatch, note that the wing leading edge is not directly in line with the hatch opening.
